verse.name: v1
verse.lines: On this Holy Lord's day morning, Master of the earth and sea; Stand we in Thy sacred presence, Hearts and souls athirst for Thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: As we come around this table, Emblematic of Thy death; Fill, O fill us with thy Spirit, Till in Thee our souls shall rest.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: May this loaf and cup remind us Of the sacrifice Thou made, Bleeding, dying for transgression That our sins on Thee be laid.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: As we look to Thee, the Author Of all hope and joy and peace, May our loyal consecration To Thee, never, never cease.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Grant us in this sacred service, To behold God's love anew; May the vision fill and thrill us, Till Thy holy will we do.
